welcome_view.title_description:
The BOScoin Wallet is an exclusive Mainnet-based wallet.
 · You can create a new account, open your account, transfer BOScoin and see
the details of your account’s Mainnet deposit and withdrawal history.
 · We completed the migration of BOScoins from Tokennet to Mainnet. You can use the wallet the same as before.
 · You can view past Tokennet transactions in the Tokennet Wallet
(https://wallet-tokennet.boscoin.io).
 · The Testnet Wallet is ONLY for ‘testing’. Do not transfer from Mainnet to Testnet
welcome_view.title_description_test:
Testnet Wallet is ONLY for ‘testing’.
Please do not transfer from the Tokennet to Testnet (BOScoin and Fees will disappear).
Please do not transfer from the Mainnet to Testnet.
welcome_view.guide_title: Step to make your account send BOScoin

guide.step2: Write down two keys and keep it safely (Very Important!!)
guide.step4: Input your seed address in the blank
guide.step5_2: button and you will see your account
guide.step6_2: button and input the public address of recipient into the blank

login_view.guide_line_1: Please input your Secret Seed to access your account.
login_view.guide_line_2: Please keep the Secret Seed to yourself, otherwise access to your wallet could be compromised.

error.invalid_secret_seed: Invalid Secret Seed or not enough balance.
error.invalid_account: You have entered wrong seed, or you have not yet activated this account.

secret_seed.checkbox_text: Create Recovery Key. Recovery Key allows safer use of the BOScoin Wallet.

recovery_key.guide_rk_line1: Enter the Recovery Key/Password for the wallet account you want to open..
recovery_key.guide_rk_line2: Do not lose or expose your Recovery Key to others. All your coins will be at risk of being stolen.
recovery_key.guide_password: Please enter the password for the wallet account you wish to open.

confirm_checkbox.precaution_1: You need a minimum balance to open a valid account. Send a minimum balance of 0.1 BOS after setting up password..
confirm_checkbox.precaution_2: All account name and address book information is stored in the app, and will be lost in case of app deletion or device change. Please keep your Public Address separately.
confirm_checkbox.precaution_3: Password is required for transfer, Secret Seed inquiry, and account import. If your password is lost or forgotten, you cannot recover it, so please remember to store your Password.
confirm_checkbox.precaution_4: Secret Seed and Recovery Key is required to import account. Please do not lose or share with others.

send_coin.input_recipient_address: Input the Public Address of recipient
send_coin.input_amount: Input the amount you want to send
send_coin.total_will_be_sent: A total of {amount} BOS will be sent to Recipient

error.minimum_balance: Minimum balance after transfer must be at least {minimum_balance} BOS.
error.decimal_limit: You can only input to 7 decimal places.

key_generator.header: Click on generate to get a new keypair
key_generator.description_line1: This tool does not create an account.
key_generator.description_line2: You have to send create_account operation to the following
key_generator.description_line3: address with a starting balance so it can exist.
key_generator.warn_line1: Please copy your Public Address and Secret Seed to somewhere safe.
key_generator.warn_line2: Make sure you don't lose or reveal your Secret Seed to anyone.
key_generator.warn_line3: You may lose all of your coins!

record_seed.warn_text1_1: Be sure to record your Public Address and Secret Seeds securely.
record_seed.warn_text1_2: Be sure not to lose or share your Secret Seed. This is the key to your Wallet.
record_seed.warn_text2_1: PLEASE double check if you have the right Seeds.
record_seed.warn_text2_2: You are solely responsible for the security of your Seeds.
record_seed.warn_text3_1: Please confirm your Seeds again. You may lose all of your funds

transaction_confirm.text: Please confirm your Transaction once again.

wallet_view.you_just_received: You have received {amount} BOS for your last transaction
wallet_view.you_just_sent: You have sent {amount} BOS for your last transaction

set_password.header: Please set the password for this account.
set_password.warn_text_1: Password is required for transfer, Secret Seed inquiry, and account import. It was
set_password.warn_text_2: Please note that your password can not be recovered if it is lost or forgotten.
set_password.input_password: Please enter a new password with at least 8 characters including uppercase and lowercase letters(English), numbers, and special characters
set_password.input_password_confirm: Please enter the above password again.

auth_user.header: Please enter the password for this account.
auth_user.input_password: The password contains at least 8 characters, including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

error_message.invalid_restorekey: Please check Recovery key or password again.

error_popup.main_message: A temporary error has occurred. Please try again.
